questions.question: What is the purpose of stock rules? (Choose two.)
answers: A. To automatically transfer assets when a low quantity threshold is detected in a stockroom
B. To track stock orders from a vendor
C. To send notifications when a low quantity threshold is detected in a stockroom
D. To track stock movement between stockrooms
E. To send notifications when a stock shipment arrives at a stockroom

comments.content:
Answer:
	A. To automatically transfer assets when a low quantity threshold is detected in a stockroom
	C. To send notifications when a low quantity threshold is detected in a stockroom

Explanation: There are two restocking options
	- An email can be sent to the stockroom manager (user identified in the Manager field on the stockroom record) to place a vendor order. A task is automatically created for the stockroom manager or, if Procurement is active, purchase order and a purchase order line item are created. (c.)
	- A transfer order can be generated automatically to restock the item from another stockroom. (d.)

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-asset-management/page/product/asset-management/concept/c_StockRules.html

AC
Stock rules send notifications or automatically transfer assets when a low-quantity threshold in a stockroom is detected.

The purpose of stock rules in ServiceNow includes the following two functions:

A. To automatically transfer assets when a low quantity threshold is detected in a stockroom: Stock rules can be configured to monitor the quantity of assets in a stockroom. When the quantity falls below a specified threshold, the stock rule triggers an automatic transfer of assets from another stockroom to ensure an adequate supply.

C. To send notifications when a low quantity threshold is detected in a stockroom: Stock rules can also be used to send notifications or alerts when the quantity of assets in a stockroom reaches a predefined low threshold. This notification helps to proactively manage inventory levels and avoid stockouts or delays in service.

Therefore, the correct options are:

A. To automatically transfer assets when a low quantity threshold is detected in a stockroom
C. To send notifications when a low quantity threshold is detected in a stockroom

Stock rules identify an action that should occur based on a threshold within a stockroom.
 Create a task assigned to the stockroom manager to create a purchase order; an
email is sent to the stockroom manager notifying them of the task
 Create a transfer order to restock from another stockroom

Upload data from an external data source into an import set.
Create a transform map.
Execute the transform map to transfer the data.
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/import-csm-assets.html

1- Load data: Data can be loaded from a spreadsheet or from a connection with a data source into an import set table.

2- Create transform map: From here, you identify how the information maps from the loaded data to the table or tables to which you want to add the imported data. Once you have your transform maps created, you can load the data and then transform.

3- Run transform: With the transform map completed, you run the transformation. This places the data in the appropriate target tables with any adjustments identified in the transform map.

Data certification process
The data certification process involves three main components:
- Create the certification filter
- Create the certification schedule
- Run the certification
The above is from the NowLearning materials
CDE - CORRECT

The three main components of the data certification process are:

    Assign the certification tasks: This involves assigning specific certification tasks to individuals or teams responsible for validating and verifying the data. These tasks typically include reviewing and validating data quality, accuracy, completeness, and compliance with relevant standards or regulations.

    Create the certification schedule: A certification schedule outlines the timing and frequency of data certification activities. It includes setting up regular intervals or specific dates for conducting data certification exercises.

    Run the certification: This component involves executing the data certification process according to the assigned tasks and schedule. It includes running the certification process, performing data checks, audits, and validations, and documenting the results of the certification exercise.

Therefore, the three main components of the data certification process are:

    B. Assign the certification tasks
    C. Create the certification schedule
    E. Run the certification

The data certification process involves three main components:
 Create the certification filter
 Create the certification schedule
 Run the certification
